# Document Similarity Detector - Project Setup

## Project Type
Information Retrieval and Semantic Web project with Python FastAPI backend and dark-themed frontend.

## Progress Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions (none needed)
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Requirements
- Python FastAPI backend ✅
- Virtual environment ✅
- Dark-themed frontend (no emojis) ✅
- File upload capability (two documents) ✅
- Multiple similarity metrics: cosine similarity, Jaccard index, TF-IDF, BERT embeddings, LSA ✅
- IR evaluation metrics: precision, recall, F1-score ✅
- Visual graphs for similarity scores ✅
- Files processed in memory (not saved) ✅

## Quick Start
1. Activate virtual environment: `source venv/bin/activate`
2. Start server: `python main.py` or `./start.sh`
3. Open browser: `http://localhost:8000`
